description: Laser-fused, waterproof down jacket: the Photics HS Thermo Parka Men. Revolutionary MAMMUT® Laser Fuse Technology™ joins two materials via laser light to create completely sealed seams without needle holes. No water penetration, no loss of down. Precise body mapping through the unrestricted design of the insulation zones. Photics. The revolutionary new down jacket.
name: Mammut Photics HS Thermo Parka - Mens
